project.name: MJ_Online
project.tagline: AI Implementation Expert Portfolio with RAG Knowledge Base and Multi-Agent Coordination

project_goals.primary: Create professional portfolio website showcasing AI implementation and LLM integration expertise to attract employment and consulting opportunities
secondary: Demonstrate practical AI implementation (RAG, chatbot, multi-agent coordination)
Establish authoritative online presence with SEO optimization
Showcase technical projects through comprehensive case studies
Position as 'AI Implementation Expert and LLM Integration Specialist'
Create knowledge management system (RAG) for content consistency
Implement multi-agent workflow for content creation

launch: Site live at MikeJones.online with HTTPS
Core pages complete (Home, About, Resume, Contact, Projects)
post_launch: AI chatbot implemented with RAG knowledge base
Strong positioning in AI implementation space

key_decisions.decision: Use Ghost Pro instead of self-hosted
key_decisions.rationale: Faster time to launch (1-2 weeks vs 3-4 weeks), no server management, focus agents on content not infrastructure, SSL/backups/email included, can migrate to self-hosted later if desired
key_decisions.impact: Eliminated Phase 1 server provisioning tasks, saved ~1 week
key_decisions.outcome: Positive - launched Ghost Pro 2026-01-28, domain configured same day

key_decisions.rationale: Professional portfolio aesthetic, dark mode support, mobile responsive, saves development time vs building custom theme

key_decisions.decision: Use Ghost built-in analytics instead of Google Analytics
key_decisions.rationale: GDPR compliant, privacy-first, included with Ghost Pro, no additional configuration

key_decisions.decision: Have Ted conduct technical interviews before case study creation
key_decisions.rationale: Comprehensive documentation (1,700-2,800 lines) provides depth for case studies, captures technical details Mike might not remember, creates authoritative source material, updates RAG with verified facts
key_decisions.impact: High-quality case study source material, RAG enrichment, showcases technical sophistication
alternatives_considered: Alice creates case studies from basic descriptions
key_decisions.outcome: Excellent - NeighborhoodShare 2,826 lines, Local LLM 1,705 lines, 23 new RAG entries

key_decisions.decision: Launch with 2 AI-focused case studies, defer AI Memory and Home Media Server
key_decisions.rationale: Speed to launch, laser-focused AI positioning aligns with professional title, 2 comprehensive case studies better than 3 decent ones, can add more post-launch
key_decisions.impact: Faster launch (~1 week savings), clearer positioning, flexibility to iterate
key_decisions.outcome: In progress - focus on NeighborhoodShare + Local LLM case studies

key_decisions.decision: Create MikeJones.online website case study as top post-launch priority
key_decisions.rationale: Meta/self-referential (compelling narrative), demonstrates practical AI implementation in business context, showcases RAG architecture and multi-agent coordination, aligns with 2026 employer trends (AI applied to business problems)
key_decisions.impact: Strong post-launch case study demonstrating complete AI implementation process
key_decisions.outcome: Planned for Phase 7.3 after chatbot implementation

phases_completed.phase: Phase 1: Ghost Pro Setup & Domain Configuration
tasks_completed: Ghost Pro account created and configured
Domain MikeJones.online configured and pointing to Ghost Pro
deliverables: Site accessible at MikeJones.online with HTTPS
phases_completed.notes: Extremely fast setup due to Ghost Pro managed hosting - eliminated all server provisioning tasks

tasks_completed: 2.1: Kyoto theme purchased ($89), installed, and activated
2.2: Visual design customized (Indigo accent #4F46E5, Onyx dark mode, typography)
2.3: Navigation configured (5 primary items, 3 secondary footer items, mobile menu)
2.6: Code injection (custom CSS for AI badges, Schema.org structured data)

challenges.challenge: Coordination between two agents working in parallel
challenges.solution: NATS coordination system prevented duplicate work

phases_completed.notes: 100% complete 2026-01-30. All 6 sub-phases done. Professional appearance achieved.

current_phase.progress: 1 case study published (NeighborhoodShare), Alice working on 2nd case study (Local LLM)

tasks_completed.notes: Three-service architecture (Ollama + Open WebUI + mcpo), MCP integration, RAG implementation, production-grade auto-start
Full-stack with AI integration, 170 users, 20 zip codes, 6-month development cycle

tasks_completed.deliverable: Published to Ghost Pro at MikeJones.online
tasks_completed.notes: Comprehensive case study based on Ted's structured interview and documentation. Published text-only; 19 screenshots to be added during Phase 5 enhancement.

tasks_queued.description: Add screenshots to published case studies

deferred_to_post_launch.reason: Redundant with Local LLM (both cover memory systems)

deferred_to_post_launch.task: 3.9 MikeJones.online Website & AI Chatbot Case Study
deferred_to_post_launch.reason: Dependencies: chatbot must be implemented first
deferred_to_post_launch.notes: Meta case study - viewing site ON the site. Demonstrates practical AI implementation.

deferred_to_post_launch.reason: Prioritize speed to launch with AI-focused positioning
deferred_to_post_launch.notes: Interview script already prepared and ready

project_manager.name: Project-Manager-Claude
project_manager.role: Project coordination, roadmap management, agent orchestration, documentation
responsibilities: Maintain roadmap and track progress
Coordinate multiple agents working in parallel
Make strategic decisions on priorities and approach
Update project memory and documentation
Manage NATS coordination system
Archive completed work
Create comprehensive project documentation

technical_research_agent.name: Ted (Technical-Research-Agent)
responsibilities: Conduct comprehensive technical interviews with Mike
Extract implementation details, architecture, decisions
Create detailed technical documentation (1,500-3,000 lines)
Update RAG knowledge base with verified entries
Hand off documentation to content creators
Document challenges, solutions, and learning outcomes
technical_research_agent.workflow: Structured interview (using prepared script) → Comprehensive documentation → RAG updates → Handoff to Alice
technical_research_agent.standard_operating_procedure: Always update RAG with 5-15 verified entries per project documenting tech stack, decisions, challenges, outcomes

web_content_builder.name: Alice (Web-Content-Builder)
responsibilities: Convert technical documentation to Ghost case studies
Create core pages (Homepage, About, Resume, Contact)
Publish content with proper SEO metadata
Upload and optimize images
Verify facts against RAG knowledge base
Ensure mobile responsiveness and accessibility
queued_work: Local LLM case study (Ted's doc ready)
web_content_builder.workflow: Receive technical doc from Ted → Convert to compelling case study → Add screenshots/assets → Verify against RAG → Publish to Ghost with SEO optimization

completed_work.deliverable: Published to Ghost (text-only, images to be added by Debbie)
Published to Ghost (text-only, images to be added by Debbie)

web_design_agent.name: Debbie (Web-Design-Agent)
web_design_agent.role: Expert visual designer, information architect, Ghost/Kyoto theme specialist
web_design_agent.expertise: 20+ years professional web design, specializing in portfolio websites
responsibilities: Fix and redesign all existing pages
Create modern, clean, functional layouts
Add images strategically from available assets
Verify all facts against RAG (critical for accuracy)
Make expert design decisions based on current trends
Ensure mobile responsiveness and professional quality
Work autonomously with clear explanations of decisions
web_design_agent.design_philosophy: Clean, minimal, functional. Modern web design with clear lines, no bells and whistles.
web_design_agent.current_assignment: PHASE 1: Fix all existing pages (7 pages total)
web_design_agent.workflow: Research current trends → Review assets → Verify facts against RAG → Design with expert decisions → Present work with clear reasoning

rag_knowledge_base.purpose: Single source of truth for all facts about Mike Jones, ensuring content consistency across all pages and agents
usage: Alice verifies all facts against RAG before publishing
Ted adds verified entries after technical interviews
Project Manager references RAG for accurate status reporting
Future chatbot will query RAG for knowledge

standard_operating_procedure.ted: Add 5-15 verified entries per project after technical interview
standard_operating_procedure.alice: Verify all facts against RAG before publishing content
standard_operating_procedure.project_manager: Reference RAG for project status and accurate reporting
standard_operating_procedure.all_agents: RAG is authoritative source, never guess or infer information not in RAG

agent_coordination.purpose: Multi-agent coordination, task queue management, status reporting

agent_startup: Publishes to coordination channel when starting work
task_execution: PM updates roadmap based on completion
project_manager: Prevents duplicate work through coordination channel

agent_coordination.status: Active since Phase 2, successfully coordinated 2 agents working in parallel without conflicts
agent_coordination.usage_example: Phase 2: Web-Content-Builder-Agent and Web-Content-Builder-2 worked on different tasks simultaneously without conflicts

case_study_creation.description: End-to-end workflow for creating comprehensive case studies

steps.action: Identify project for case study, create Ted's interview script if needed
steps.output: Interview script with comprehensive question sections

steps.action: Conduct structured technical interview with Mike
steps.output: Detailed notes on architecture, decisions, challenges, outcomes

steps.action: Update RAG knowledge base with verified entries
steps.output: 5-15 new RAG entries covering tech stack, architecture, decisions, outcomes

steps.action: Announce completion and hand off to Alice via coordination channel
steps.output: NATS message with deliverable location and RAG update count

steps.action: Convert technical doc to compelling Ghost case study
tasks: Structure content for case study format
Verify facts against RAG knowledge base

steps.action: Update roadmap and archive completed task
steps.output: Roadmap updated, task moved to archive with completion metadata

case_study_creation.quality_advantage: Comprehensive technical depth from structured interviews, verified facts in RAG, professional presentation

rag_update_workflow.description: Standard workflow for maintaining RAG knowledge base
rag_update_workflow.trigger: After any technical interview or significant project documentation
steps: Read RAG schema for entry format
Check for existing entries to avoid duplicates
Include RAG update count in handoff message

entry_structure.source: Technical interview with Mike Jones, DATE

rag_update_workflow.quality_control: All entries marked 'verified' from direct interview, include source attribution

parallel_agent_coordination.description: How multiple agents work simultaneously without conflicts
process: PM assigns distinct tasks to different agents
Agents monitor coordination channel for dependencies
PM updates roadmap based on completion messages
parallel_agent_coordination.success_example: Phase 2: Two web content builders worked on different tasks (2.2/2.3 vs 2.4/2.5/2.6) simultaneously without conflicts

challenges_and_solutions.challenge: Ensuring content consistency across multiple pages and agents
challenges_and_solutions.solution: Created RAG knowledge base (123 entries) as single source of truth, all agents verify facts against RAG
challenges_and_solutions.outcome: Consistent professional title, experience years, project details across all content

challenges_and_solutions.challenge: Creating comprehensive case studies without complete project documentation
challenges_and_solutions.solution: Ted conducts structured technical interviews before case study creation, produces 1,500-3,000 line technical docs
challenges_and_solutions.outcome: NeighborhoodShare (2,826 lines) and Local LLM (1,705 lines) comprehensive documentation
challenges_and_solutions.impact: High - enables deep, accurate case studies showcasing technical sophistication

challenges_and_solutions.challenge: Coordinating multiple agents working in parallel
challenges_and_solutions.solution: NATS JetStream coordination system with task queue and coordination channel
challenges_and_solutions.outcome: Two web content builders worked simultaneously on different tasks without conflicts
challenges_and_solutions.impact: Medium - enabled parallel work, prevented duplicate effort

challenges_and_solutions.challenge: Determining optimal case study portfolio for launch
challenges_and_solutions.solution: Strategic decision: 2 comprehensive AI-focused case studies align with positioning, defer others post-launch
challenges_and_solutions.outcome: Faster path to launch (~1 week savings), clearer AI positioning
challenges_and_solutions.impact: High - prioritizes speed and positioning clarity

challenges_and_solutions.solution: Project Manager creates and maintains comprehensive PROJECT-MEMORY.json documenting decisions, workflows, challenges
challenges_and_solutions.outcome: Complete project history for case study creation and future reference
challenges_and_solutions.impact: High - enables MikeJones.online case study, institutional knowledge preservation

milestones.milestone: Ghost Pro configured, domain live with HTTPS
Phase 2 complete (6/6 tasks), professional design achieved
Asset gathering sufficient for first pass
Ted completes Local LLM technical documentation (1,705 lines)
Ted completes NeighborhoodShare technical documentation (2,826 lines)
Ted completes RAG review (13 new entries, total 123)
Decision: Launch with 2 AI case studies
Decision: MikeJones.online website case study as top post-launch priority

velocity.phase_1: 1 day (extremely fast due to Ghost Pro)
velocity.estimated_remaining: ~7 days (case studies + core pages + testing + launch)

phase_7_priority_queue.description: Knowledge base-powered chatbot using Cloudflare Workers
Meta case study about building the site with RAG and multi-agent coordination
phase_7_priority_queue.notes: Top priority case study post-launch - demonstrates practical AI implementation

phase_7_priority_queue.description: Import RSS feeds from Resilient Tomorrow and Organizational Intelligence

phase_7_priority_queue.notes: Optional - evaluate if adds enough value beyond Local LLM

lessons_learned: Ghost Pro dramatically accelerates launch vs. self-hosted (eliminated 1 week of infrastructure work)
Structured technical interviews produce exceptional case study source material (2,000+ lines per project)
RAG knowledge base ensures content consistency across multiple agents and pages
NATS coordination enables parallel agent work without conflicts
Quality over quantity: 2 comprehensive case studies > 3 decent ones
Speed to launch matters: defer non-critical features to post-launch iteration
Agent specialization works: Ted for technical depth, Alice for content creation, PM for coordination
Project memory documentation enables meta case study (MikeJones.online about building MikeJones.online)

metadata.update_frequency: After significant milestones or phase completions
metadata.purpose: Comprehensive project memory for continuity, case study material, and institutional knowledge
usage: Project Manager reference for status and decisions
Ted interview material for MikeJones.online case study
